x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.metadata) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.metadata))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.spec) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.spec))
